location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Chief Secretary to Government, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is communicating further information on a French Emissary (first mentioned in a letter dated 8 January 1811, see ff. 13v-14). It notes that the emissary is proceeding to Tehran from Shiraz, and that while he cannot speak Persian he can speak Arabic.
